column2: §MAll players will be notified of this debug mode action!§!

[expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHumanName]) has used Debug Mode to destroy all protectorates where the suzerain is an AI character.

[expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHumanName]) has used Debug Mode to destroy all of [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected.GetTitledFirstName]'s protectorates.

[expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHumanName]) has used Debug Mode to cancel [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected.GetTitledFirstName]'s protectorate status. ([expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected.GetHerHisCap] suzerain was [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected_other.GetTitledFirstName].)

[expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHumanName]) has used Debug Mode to force [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected.GetTitledFirstName] to become a protectorate of [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected_other.GetTitledFirstName].

[expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHumanName]) has used Debug Mode to force [expd_t_debug_mode_character_affected.GetTitledFirstName] to be [expd_t_debug_mode_decision_taker.GetHerHis] protectorate.
